graph_title: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
indicator_name: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.1: To significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.1.2: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator is defined as the total count of conflict-related deaths divided by the total population, expressed per 100,000 population.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.1: To significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
